alert.note: Alert for Lower Iberia; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 07 at 2:05PM CST until January 09 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON MONDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Lower Vermilion, Lower Iberia and Lower St. Mary Parishes. * WHEN...From noon Monday to midnight CST Monday night. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Actual tide levels are expected to be between 1.5 and 2.0 feet mean higher high water.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Lower Iberia; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion
